result.reason: RDCMan deserializer rejects v2.92+ files due to hardcoded version whitelist (2.7, 2.83) in VerifyFileVersion(), even though schema 3 is backward-compatible across all these versions.
result.approach: Change VerifyFileVersion() to accept any programVersion >= 2.7 with schemaVersion 3, instead of exact-match whitelist. The schema structure is identical across 2.7/2.83/2.92, so version gating should be >= based, not whitelist-based.

attempts.raw_output:
